edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.logging

Class ConsoleUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.logging.ConsoleUtils

  • public class ConsoleUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The output generator for a running environment that provides status updates and monitors the progress in a separate thread to consistently verify correct operation. Intended Operator: System

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) HybridTime environmentTime
      Current environment time
      (package private) static EngineSupervisor linkedEngine
      Engine that is linked to the system output
      (package private) static java.io.PrintWriter logFileOut
      Print writer that is writing a console log file (if enabled)
      (package private) static java.lang.Double nextProgressUpdatePrintTime
      Time to print next progress update statement
      (package private) static java.lang.Double nextSystemMonitorPrintTime
      Time (real) to print the next system update
      (package private) static java.io.OutputStream out
      Output stream that can change where console prints to
      (package private) static java.lang.Double progressUpdatePrintInterval
      Interval between progress update print statements
      (package private) static java.text.SimpleDateFormat sdf
      Date format for all console messages
      (package private) static com.be3short.io.info.SystemInfo sysInfo
      System information gatherer
      (package private) static java.lang.Thread systemMonitorThread
      Thread that prints system status periodically, is sepearate from main thread so it will still print if main is stuck

        Print the next progress update if ready
        Parameters:
        engine - engine whose progress will be printed
        override_time - flag indicating that the progress update should be printed regardless if next update time has been reached
